Dandelion With Mods.description:
A minecraft resource pack built on top of the original pack 'Dandelion', adding improved blocks & items, custom models and mod support!
Its development is currently halted.

Triangles.description:
Triangles is the most thorough WebGL Experiment in which I learned about graphics, GPUs, WebGL/OpenGL and everything connected to it.
Additionally it looks dope, try it out!

Matrices & 3D.description: A study of 3D perspective and matrices - Translations, rotations, scaling, fov, ...

Win95-web.description:
A Javascript implementation of Microsoft's Windows 95 on the web.
It's built without frameworks or libraries, just pure modern Javascript. Thus, it will only work on modern browsers.

Tools.description: A variety of small tools, currently featuring a random number generator, a lightweight minecraft model creator, a text spacer and a very useful mocking text generator.

3D Magic.description: A minimal minecraft model creator which displays minecraft models from their JSON format in a model viewing environment, featuring an integrated text editor to modify the model

Random figure generator.description: A tool to generate random numbers. Their amount, starting and ending point and the precision is customizable

Mocking generator.description: A tool to generate text iN ThE MOcKboB sTylE which is no outdated meme at all

Spacing generator.description: A tool converting text to a format alternating between characters and spaces. The amount of spaces in between every character is customizable

Slider89.description:
Slider89 is a Javascript library for creating customizable sliders.
Be aware that it's not particularily good which is why it's currently being rewritten!
